heroDescription: Engineered from my lathe to your lanyard for the waterfowlers that want a call made how you want it, not off the shelf that gives you award-winning sound quality and runnability with no shortcuts.
bestSellerDescription: Smaller, lighter, and faster, just like your sub-gauge shotgun. When you need to get on the birds in a hurry with speed and quickness but still have all the power you could ever need.
lineupLinkText: Shop the rest of the lineup
fieldReportsSubheading: Join the #ColdFrontFamily and share your harvest.
